data.meanings: to provide, supply, bestow, grant. turzaqan - you both shall be supplied. rizq - bounty, gift. raziq - one who provides or supplies. razzaq -great provider/supplier.
data.sentence: The word لَرِزْقُنَا comes from the root ر ز ق and is associated with the meanings: to provide, supply, bestow, grant. turzaqan - you both shall be supplied. rizq - bounty, gift. raziq - one who provides or supplies. razzaq -great provider/supplier.

data.meanings: to vanish, fail, cease, pass away, be exhausted, consumed, spent.
data.sentence: The word نَفَادٍ comes from the root ن ف د and is associated with the meanings: to vanish, fail, cease, pass away, be exhausted, consumed, spent.
